                            int slot,
                            java.lang.Integer... pageArgs)
        Puts a provided ItemStack in the slot provided
        Parameters:
        is - ItemStack to add
        slot - Slot to put the item in (must be 0, 1 or 2!)
        pageArgs - Unused, required param from parent class
        Returns:
        The GuiItem or null if there was an error

        public void unregister()
        Unregisters the Listeners from this class. Does not need to be called manually to handle inventory closes, etc.

      • setItemStack

        public GuiItem setItemStack(org.bukkit.Material mat,
                            java.lang.String name,
                            int slot,
                            java.lang.Integer... pageArgs)
        Adds an item to the Window
        Parameters:
        mat - Material for the Item
        name - Name of the item
        slot - slot in which the item should be (must be 0, 1 or 2!)
        pageArgs - Unused, required from parent class
        Returns:
        the added GuiItem or null if there was an error

      • getText

        public java.lang.String getText()
